node.text: An essential part of sustainable tourism at all our resorts is water conservation and going that extra mile in ensuring that the water bodies surrounding our properties never face any quality threat brought about by human error. Each one of us is part of India’s water future!  #KeralaTourism #Kerala #LuxuryResort #Raviz #TheRaviz #TravelDestinations #Luxury #GodsOwnCountry #DestinationKerala #Destinations #ResortsinKerala #Travel #Wanderlust #RavizKadavu #RavizCalicut #RavizAshtamudi #RavizKovalam #WorldWaterDay #SaveWater #WWD #WorldWaterDay2020 #WWD2020 #WaterScarcity #WaterCrisis #CleanWater #ForOurWater #Water
